Token.Abstract: Returns the number of overlays managed for anOverlayView by the data source object.

Parameter.Name: anOverlayView
Parameter.Abstract: The overlay view that sent the message.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of overlays in anOverlayView.

Token.Abstract: Invoked by the overlay view to return the data object associated with the specified index.

Parameter.Name: anOverlayView
Parameter.Abstract: The overlay view that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: num
Parameter.Abstract: The overlay view that sent the message.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An item in the data source at the specified index of the view. Must respond to -(NSRect)rect or -(NSRect)rectValue.
